entries.journal_entry_description: Epo Qetora, self proclaimed famous historian has come to Mustafar to try and discover its background. He claims that the planets history is a mystery past the last few hundred years and want to find out what happened in the millenia before that. You've agreed to assist him a second time.
entries.task02_message_box_text: Among the remains, you find one of the tablet pieces for Epo!
entries.task04_message_box_text: In the robes of the slain woman, you find one of the tablet pieces for Epo!
entries.task06_message_box_text: In the scavengers backpack, you find one of the tablet pieces for Epo!
entries.task08_message_box_text: Among the rubble, you find one of the tablet pieces for Epo!
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Epo wants you to retrieve the missing pieces of the tablet he found. He believes there to be four more pieces and he thinks they are somewhere around an old camp North East of the new mining facility, South of the bunker you visited the last time you worked for Epo.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: You've found four pieces of the tablet. Return to Epo and see if that completes the tablet.
